name: (R) Best HP FS (Other Fossil Boiler)
_description: Best available air source heat pump fully replacing original fuel oil/propane boiler equipment

notes: COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see EIA source)
split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)

notes: Retail (new) and total installed (existing) for 'High' ASHPs in 2023
For existing buildings, additional tank removal costs of 800 2014$ (1030 2023$) are applied for distillate and propane based on the 2015 EIA report, updating the cost from April 2014 to April 2022.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiples were determined as proportion of total homes with non-NG fossil-based heating that have both cooling and heating systems in each BA climate zone. Cooling multiple of 2% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a cooling system (16,171 homes) where there is heating via a heating energy source other than natural gas, electricity, or biomass AND heating is done via steam/hot water system (348 homes).
